item.title: I have a server but how can I get others to join
item.dc:creator: @GuNtRiX GuNtRiX
item.description:
@GuNtRiX wrote:

Ok once you have created an account type in your server name e.g (mescape) and click on the no-ip.biz and chose no-ip.org (thats the one I always use) then type in you ip address you can get that from here http://www.whatsmyip.org/ its at the bottom. Then click create server on the no-ip website. Now go to this http://www.download.com/No-IP-DUC-Dynamic-Update-Client-/3000-2165-10055182.html?part=dl-NoIPDUCDy&subj=dl&tag=button
download it then install it and open it and you server name should be there with a simile face next to it and make sure the box next to it is ticked and then run your server and log in!
Hope That Helps!

Read full topic

item.description:
@deadfast142 wrote:

Click Here:

either use no-ip www.no-ip.com or use hamachi which you can download here www.hamaci.cc then just advertise it

ok im doing the no-ip thing…how do I get a thing for my server?[br][size=1]Posted on: March 18, 2007, 09:19:31 AM[/size][hr]please help…how do I get the thing for my server? im useing no-ip.info[br][size=1]Posted on: March 18, 2007, 09:22:27 AM[/size][hr]Can someone give me a step by step thing for no-ip…i have a account for the no-ip I just need to know how to give a IP to my server so other people can join
